items.sentence: I hope that Tom is going to do the right thing.
I hope that Tom did what he was supposed to do.
I hope that Tom isn't the first one to do that.
I hope that Tom is still awake when I get home.
I wish that I'd had the chance to learn French.
I wish that I'd gone to the theater last night.
I wish that I'd eaten lunch before I came here.
Tom stopped Mary before she could say anything.
It's a shame that I'm too young to drive a car.
I'm really happy you could assist us with this.
I don't think the situation will get any worse.
Did you find out when Tom is going to be there?
Every Canadian I've met has been very friendly.
Tom told me he isn't certain what he should do.
Tom knows that he isn't supposed to park there.
Tom knows he isn't supposed to do that anymore.
Tom is going to get killed if he isn't careful.
Did you tell Tom he isn't allowed in this room?
Would you believe me if I told you I loved you?
Tom lives in Boston, and Mary lives in Chicago.
